reviewText: terrible.  complete waste of $2.00.  I have no idea what was going on or why.  good luck.
all products were great.did not receive square deal protections plans and rescue protection plan.
Not NC-17 more like PG-13.  I was robbed!!!! Total misrepresentation. Love Amazon ,but you cats have to stop censoring the damn movies and stop misrepresenting the content.

Had the pleasure of seeing this movie at a presentation with the director and became a big fan. The movie has a dark tone and feel to it which I'm sure is due, in no small part, to it being based on real events. Would definitely recommend to fans of film noir', grind house or crime/drama.
